query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emailWarmup (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employerId INT NOT NULL,
  domain VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'active',
  startDate DATE NOT NULL,
  currentDay INT DEFAULT 1,
  totalDays INT DEFAULT 30,
  dailyLimit INT DEFAULT 10,
  targetVolume INT DEFAULT 1000,
  sentToday INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalSent INT DEFAULT 0,
  warmupSchedule JSON,
  lastSentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_employer_domain (employerId, domain),
  INDEX idx_employer (employerId),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_domain (domain),
  FOREIGN KEY (employerId) REFERENCES employers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
